title: Before I Failed
description: Tom Seed did it. From a dirty place surrounded by nothing to the blazing hot sunshine of Los Angeles. No more pain or poverty.Just a perfect life. His own business, his own car, his own house, money, lover.He had everything he ever wanted. At least he thought so.To see other men in his age, living a different life to his, owning different things, spending time differently changed everything.It should have helped him, but it hurt him instead.Before I Failed is a story. A story of living somebody elseâ€™s life.
author: Tomas Veres
